resources.string: To work fully in this window, you need special permission. In the setting of this application, give special permission.
3 tap instant click on block button, activates SOS mailing.\n\nIf you consider support us, please contact brighterDeeds@gmail.com
You have not added emergency contacts yet, click + button and add them
This is an app widget description
You are my emergency contact. I need some help. Here is my approximate location:https://www.google.com/maps/dir/?api=1&destination=%1$s,%2$s&travelmode=driving
Вы мой экстренный контакт. Мне нужна помощь. Вот мое примерное местоположение:https://www.google.com/maps/dir/?api=1&destination=%1$s,%2$s&travelmode=driving
Siz mening kontaktimdasiz. Menga sizdan yordam kerak, teziroq. Men joylashgan o\'rin: https://www.google.com/maps/dir/?api=1&destination=%1$s,%2$s&travelmode=driving
Siz meniń jeke kontaktımdasız. Maǵan sizden járdem kerek, tezirek. Bul men turǵan jer: https://www.google.com/maps/dir/?api=1&destination=%1$s,%2$s&travelmode=driving
Do you really want to stop sending SMS messages?
Turn on GPS or mobile internet, without this the application will not work!
Before using the application, you need to give permission for the location and for reading contacts, since the application will not work without these permissions.
